item.title: classic-widgets
item.dc:creator: cbringmann
item.content:encoded: Bolding text and adding an image with the classic widget editor.

item.title: block-widgets-1
item.dc:creator: cbringmann
item.content:encoded: Adding an image as a background behind another image, changing the image’s focus, changing the overlay color and opacity, adding duotone, and moving the title within the group in the block editor.

item.title: custom-html-1
item.dc:creator: cbringmann
item.content:encoded: Widget displays the text “Open” and in another column, “Kayak rentals and other facilities close at sunset.” After changes are made to a javascript file in a text editor, the text on the front end reads “Closed” and “Kayak rentals and other facilities open at sunrise.”
